sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均有"或许，大概"之意。
means: maybe ： 普通用词，美国英语多用。指某事也许如此，含不能确定意味。
perhaps ： 普通用词，多用于英国，与maybe同义。
possibly ： 指客观上潜存着发生某种变化的可能。
probably ： 一般指根据逻辑推理，估计有发生的可能，把握性较大，语气比possibly强。

sentence.Network_en: She probably sensed that I wasn'ttelling her the whole story.
sentence.Network_cn: 她可能意识到了我并没有对她全盘托出。

sentence.Network_en: Swimming is probably the best form of exercise you can get.
sentence.Network_cn: 游泳或许是现有的最佳锻炼方式。

sentence.Network_en: If there was any disappointment it was probably temporary.
sentence.Network_cn: 即便有点儿失望，也肯定是暂时的。

entry.def: If you say that something is probably the case, you think that it is likely to be the case, although you are not sure.

example.ex: The White House probably won't make this plan public until July...
example.tran: 白宫可能要等到7月份才会公开这个计划。

example.ex: Van Gogh is probably the best-known painter in the world.
example.tran: 凡·高可能是世界上最知名的画家。

entry.tran: （用于缓和语气）大概，或许，可能
entry.def: You can use probably when you want to make your opinion sound less forceful or definite, so that you do not offend people.

example.ex: He probably thinks you're both crazy!
example.tran: 他可能认为你们两个人都疯了！

means.word_mean: 1. with considerable certainty; without much doubt;

sentences.sentence: "He is probably out of the country"
"in all likelihood we are headed for war"

means.word_mean: 2. easy to believe on the basis of available evidence;

auth_sentence.content: I am short though, so that probably helped.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am short though, so that probably helped.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am short though, so that probably helped.

auth_sentence.content: The album's title probably doesn't help either.
auth_sentence.res_content: The album's title probably doesn't help either.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The album's title probably doesn't help either.

auth_sentence.content: That's probably gone now but never say never.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's probably gone now but never say never.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's probably gone now but never say never.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报

according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而

chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

Sentence.sentence: Whereas language probably traces back at least 80.
What are the speakers most probably doing?
What has probably caused closeness to increase among sisters and brothers according to VC

means.word_mean: 大概; 或许; 可能; 几乎肯定;十之八九

sentences.en: He'll probably find himself in pocket in a good year.
sentences.cn: 年头好时, 他会发现自己赚钱。

sentences.en: Next year I shall probably be looking for a job.
sentences.cn: 明年我很可能找份工作。

sentences.en: We're going on holiday soon, probably next month.
sentences.cn: 我们很快要去度假了, 可能是下个月。
我可能会稍微晚一点 (到)。

jushi.english: Last year we supplied the market with 1500 ducks; today the number will probably double.
jushi.chinese: 去年我们供应市场1500只鸭子,今年可能会增加一倍。

jushi.english: There will probably be many people after the job but even so I'd still apply for it if I were you.
jushi.chinese: 也许会有许多人想得到这份工作,但即便如此,如果我是你的话,我仍然会申请的。

jushi.english: He went out probably by the back door.
